headline: Oracle Corp. (ORCL) Sheds 5.9% as AI Bubble Fears Linger
summary: We recently published 10 Stocks With Massive Losses; AI Firms Not Spared. Oracle Corp. (NYSE:ORCL) is one of the worst performers on Friday. Oracle Corp. saw its share prices decline by 5.9 percent on Friday to end at $226.13 apiece as investors sold off positions in Artificial Intelligence stocks amid warnings of an AI bubble. [因
